title: We STAN Standard Time, Trollin’ With NFTs 3.21.22
itunes:title: We STAN Standard Time, Trollin’ With NFTs 3.21.22
description:
In episode 1208, Jack and Miles are joined by TV writer Korama Danquah to discuss... Is Standard Time the thing we actually need to embrace permanently?, Grey’s Anatomy Writer put on leave for lying about medical history…, Pepe The Frog NFTs are, Predictably, a Clusterfuck, Another Issue With Crypto Is It’s Used By Right Wing Dictators and more!

  1. Is Standard Time the thing we actually need to embrace permanently?
  2. Grey’s Anatomy Writer put on leave for lying about medical history…
  3. Pepe The Frog NFTs are, Predictably, a Clusterfuck
  4. Neo-Nazi Site Daily Stormer Takes Down Pepe Images After Getting Copyright Claims From Its Creator
  5. Sad Frogs District statistics
  6. Pepe the Frog’s Creator Nuked a $4 Million NFT Collection Over Copyright
  7. Another Issue With Crypto Is It’s Used By Right Wing Dictators
  8. Preying on the poor? Opportunities and challenges for tackling the social and environmental threats of cryptocurrencies for vulnerable and low-income communities
  9. Nayib Bukele may want to become Latin America’s first millennial dictator
  10. Terrorist Financing and Virtual Currencies: Different Sides of the Same Bitcoin?
  11. How the great migration of cryptocurrency mining is playing a rising role in the global energy crisis

koramadanquah.com/

LISTEN: Peace Of Mind (Virgil Abloh Remix with Fela Kuti) by Rema

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
